entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 12:05 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
